books.title: The Problem of Political Authority
books.author: Michael Huemer
books.whyILoveIt: A rigorous philosophical examination of why governments claim authority and whether those claims are justified. Changed how I think about legitimacy.

books.title: The Machinery of Freedom
books.author: David Friedman
books.whyILoveIt: A practical exploration of how a stateless society might function. Friedman's economic approach to anarchism is uniquely compelling.

books.title: Seeing Like a State
books.author: James C. Scott
books.whyILoveIt: Essential reading for anyone interested in governance. Scott's concept of 'metis' and critique of high-modernist planning is profound.

books.title: Antifragile
books.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
books.whyILoveIt: Taleb's framework for things that gain from disorder. The concept of antifragility has shaped how I think about building resilient systems.

books.title: The Sovereign Individual
books.author: James Dale Davidson & Lord William Rees-Mogg

books.title: Stubborn Attachments
books.author: Tyler Cowen
books.whyILoveIt: The moral case for economic growth as a near-sacred duty. Cowen argues that maximizing sustainable growth is the most ethical thing we can do for future generations—a belief I hold deeply.

books.title: The Beginning of Infinity
books.author: David Deutsch
books.whyILoveIt: On my list because of its exploration of the power of explanatory knowledge. Deutsch's optimism about human potential is inspiring.

books.title: Scientific Freedom: The Elixir of Civilization
books.author: Donald W. Braben

books.title: Against the Machine: On the Unmaking of Humanity
books.author: Paul Kingsnorth

books.title: Breakneck: China's Quest to Engineer the Future
books.author: Dan Wang

books.title: Valuable Humans in Transit and Other Stories
books.author: qntm

books.title: Why Greatness Cannot Be Planned: The Myth of the Objective
books.author: Kenneth O. Stanley & Joel Lehman

books.title: It's Good to Be a Man: A Handbook for Godly Masculinity
books.author: Michael Foster & Dominic Bnonn Tennant

books.title: Chief Of Staff: The Strategic Partner Who Will Revolutionize Your Organization
books.author: Tyler Parris

books.title: When All Else Fails: The Ethics of Resistance to State Injustice
books.author: Jason Brennan

books.title: Inside Congress
books.author: Trevor Corning, Nolan Dolan & Ryan Strasser

books.title: The Nvidia Way: Jensen Huang and the Making of a Tech Giant
books.author: Tae Kim

books.title: Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance
books.author: Robert M. Pirsig

books.title: Reentry: SpaceX, Elon Musk, and the Reusable Rockets that Launched a Second Space Age
books.author: Eric Berger

books.title: Cribsheet: A Data-Driven Guide to Better, More Relaxed Parenting
books.author: Emily Oster

books.title: How Life Works: A User's Guide to the New Biology
books.author: Philip Ball

books.title: Everything Is Predictable: How Bayesian Statistics Explain Our World
books.author: Tom Chivers

books.title: Life 3.0: Being Human in the Age of Artificial Intelligence
books.author: Max Tegmark

books.title: What's Our Problem?: A Self-Help Book for Societies
books.author: Tim Urban

books.title: Science and Development of Muscle Hypertrophy
books.author: Brad Schoenfeld

books.title: Red Famine: Stalin's War on Ukraine
books.author: Anne Applebaum

books.title: The Launch Pad: Inside Y Combinator
books.author: Randall Stross

books.title: The Fish That Ate the Whale
books.author: Rich Cohen

books.title: Lion City: Singapore and the Invention of Modern Asia
books.author: Jeevan Vasagar

books.title: Fool's Errand: Time to End the War in Afghanistan
books.author: Scott Horton

books.title: Liftoff: Elon Musk and the Desperate Early Days That Launched SpaceX
books.author: Eric Berger

books.title: Building the Future
books.author: Amy C. Edmondson & Susan Salter Reynolds

books.title: The WEIRDest People in the World
books.author: Joseph Henrich

books.title: Your Next Government?
books.author: Tom W. Bell
books.whyILoveIt: The best book on special economic zones and competitive governance. Bell's legal framework for 'special jurisdictions' directly shaped my work at Próspera.

books.title: Invent and Wander: The Collected Writings of Jeff Bezos
books.author: Jeff Bezos & Walter Isaacson

books.title: Flow: The Psychology of Optimal Experience
books.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

books.title: The Hard Thing About Hard Things
books.author: Ben Horowitz

books.title: Word by Word: The Secret Life of Dictionaries
books.author: Kory Stamper

books.title: Order without Design: How Markets Shape Cities
books.author: Alain Bertaud

books.title: It Doesn't Have to Be Crazy at Work
books.author: Jason Fried & David Heinemeier Hansson

books.title: The Entrepreneurial Bible to Venture Capital
books.author: Andrew Romans

books.title: New City Upon a Hill: A History of Columbia, Maryland
books.author: Joseph Rocco Mitchell & David L. Stebenne

books.title: The Joy of x: A Guided Tour of Math
books.author: Steven Strogatz

books.title: Letting Go: The Pathway of Surrender
books.author: David R. Hawkins

books.title: Who We Are and How We Got Here
books.author: David Reich

books.title: What I Learned Losing a Million Dollars
books.author: Jim Paul & Brendan Moynihan

books.title: The 10,000 Year Explosion
books.author: Gregory Cochran & Henry Harpending
books.whyILoveIt: Demolishes the idea that human evolution stopped 50,000 years ago. Cochran and Harpending show how agriculture accelerated genetic change—provocative and rigorous.

books.title: Troubled: A Memoir of Foster Care, Family, and Social Class
books.author: Rob Henderson

books.title: The Making of the Atomic Bomb
books.author: Richard Rhodes

books.title: The Moral Case for Fossil Fuels
books.author: Alex Epstein

books.title: The Biggest Ideas in the Universe
books.author: Sean Carroll

books.title: To Sleep in a Sea of Stars
books.author: Christopher Paolini

books.title: The Molecule of More
books.author: Daniel Z. Lieberman & Michael E. Long

books.title: A Short History of Nearly Everything
books.author: Bill Bryson

books.title: Breath: The New Science of a Lost Art
books.author: James Nestor

books.title: Reality Is Not What It Seems
books.author: Carlo Rovelli

books.title: Caffeine: How Caffeine Created the Modern World
books.author: Michael Pollan

books.title: Lifespan: Why We Age—and Why We Don't Have To
books.author: David A. Sinclair

books.title: Range: Why Generalists Triumph in a Specialized World
books.author: David Epstein

books.title: Astrophysics for People in a Hurry
books.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

books.title: For A New Liberty
books.author: Murray N. Rothbard
books.whyILoveIt: The libertarian manifesto. Rothbard systematically applies property rights and non-aggression to every area of society—radical, uncompromising, and thrilling to read.

books.title: What Has Government Done to Our Money?
books.author: Murray N. Rothbard

books.title: Economic Policy: Thoughts for Today and Tomorrow
books.author: Ludwig von Mises

books.title: Eve: How the Female Body Drove 200 Million Years of Human Evolution
books.author: Cat Bohannon

books.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
books.author: Jules Verne
